meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny -

Get ready to unbox some serious fun with Hypercharge: Unboxed! As a seasoned grok (get it?), I'm here to give you the lowdown on this charming multiplayer shooter. And trust me, folks, this review is gonna be more fun than a box of surprises at your local toy store!

First off, let's get the serious stuff out of the way: Hypercharge: Unboxed plays extremely well, runs smoothly, and offers plenty of fun and challenge for groups of friends (God is a Geek, you're preaching to the choir!). The game has a certain je ne sais quoi that makes it hard to put down - much like my old Tamagotchi back in the day.

Now, I know what you're thinking: "But what about the other critics?" Ah, yes! Those guys (and girls) are some of the most fun-loving folks in the business. Take TheXboxHub, for instance; they're all about that #FunVibesOnly life, just like me! They say Hypercharge: Unboxed is the kind of game you play with a big smile on your face the entire time - I mean, who wouldn't want that?!

And don't even get me started on ZTGD! Those guys are always good for a laugh (or a groan, depending on how you look at it). They say Hypercharge: Unboxed is "a joy to play with others" - and I'm like, yeah, duh! What's more fun than playing with your buddies? It's like having an endless supply of quarters at the arcade (remember those?).

Now, I know some of you might be thinking, "But what about the score?" Well, let me tell you, folks, this review is all about the play - not the score! But if you insist on knowing, just take a look at the scores from those fancy-pants critics like God is a Geek (85) and Gaming Nexus (85). Yeah, it looks like Hypercharge: Unboxed has got some serious street cred!

All in all, folks, Hypercharge: Unboxed is the kind of game that'll make you feel like a kid again - minus the tantrums and endless requests for more allowance. Trust me, this one's gonna be a blast!
